alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rooks and southwestern Phillips Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Prairie View to near Logan to 7 miles northeast of Hill City. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Damar, Glade, Speed and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
